channel.title: Posts on Erio's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Erio's blog

item.title: Chinese Test
item.description: 正文测试 不是完全重要。 奥斯特洛夫斯基曾经说过，共同的事业，共同的斗争，可以使人们产生忍受一切的力量。 引用 一 二 百度 图片 Photo by Florian Klauer on Unsplash Photo by Luca Bravo on Unsplash Photo by Helena Hertz on Unsplash Photo by Hudai Gayiran on Unsplash ![Photo by Florian Klauer on Unsplash](florian-klauer-nptLmg6jqDo-unsplash.jpg) ![Photo by Luca Bravo on Unsplash](luca-bravo-alS7ewQ41M8-unsplash.jpg) ![Photo by Helena Hertz on Unsplash](helena-hertz-wWZzXlDpMog-unsplash.jpg) ![Photo by Hudai Gayiran on Unsplash](hudai-gayiran-3Od_VKcDEAA-unsplash.jpg) 相册语法来自 Typlog

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
